Bob Haugen wrote:
> 
> 
> Another possibility we have discussed previously on this list is to make 
> a resource of the transaction itself.
> 
> At that point, you could do some variation on 2-phase commit where the 
> transaction resource is the coordinator.

That's what I did for httplr. The message exchange is a resource. it's 
nice for management purposes:

http://www.dehora.net/doc/httplr/draft-httplr-01.html

I should make time to send that into the RFC Editor. Some day.

cheers
Bill
